books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.authorInfo: James Clear is a writer and speaker focused on habits, decision making, and continuous improvement.
books.bookInfo: Atomic Habits explains how small daily habits can lead to remarkable results over time by focusing on systems rather than goals.

books.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
books.author: Robert Kiyosaki
books.authorInfo: Robert Kiyosaki is an entrepreneur and financial educator known for teaching personal finance through storytelling.
books.bookInfo: Rich Dad Poor Dad compares two approaches to money and highlights the importance of financial education and investing.
